cleaned_text: Students are required to show proof of certain immunizations prior to their arrival to campus. Review the information below carefully. All new students are required to provide proof of immunization against: Students should also consider immunization against varicella (chickenpox). All nursing, physical therapy, and medical (M.D.) students are required to obtain additional immunizations and tuberculosis screening as described on the [nursing, physical therapy, and medical student immunization forms](../uploading-immunization-forms/index.html).
